statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE healthcare_provider_id = 1;
SELECT healthcare_provider_name, healthcare_provider_location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE healthcare_provider_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, patient_diagnosis FROM healthcare_providers WHERE patient_treatment_plan LIKE '%surgery%';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY healthcare_provider_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT healthcare_provider_specialty FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE healthcare_provider_specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY healthcare_provider_name ASC;
SELECT healthcare_provider_name, healthcare_provider_location, patient_name FROM healthcare_providers WHERE healthcare_provider_location = 'New York' AND patient_diagnosis LIKE '%Cancer%';
SELECT DISTINCT healthcare_provider_specialty FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY healthcare_provider_specialty DESC;
SELECT healthcare_provider_name, patient_name, patient_diagnosis, patient_treatment_plan FROM healthcare_providers WHERE patient_id = 101 OR patient_id = 103;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_providers, healthcare_provider_specialty FROM healthcare_providers GROUP BY healthcare_provider_specialty HAVING total_providers > 2 ORDER BY total_providers DESC;
SELECT * FROM Providers;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM Providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, count(*) AS patient_count FROM Providers JOIN Patients ON Providers.provider_id = Patients.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Providers
SELECT provider_name, location FROM Providers WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT provider_name, COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM Providers LEFT JOIN Patients ON Providers.provider_id = Patients.provider_id GROUP BY Providers.provider_name
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31'
SELECT provider_name, patient_name, diagnosis FROM Providers JOIN Patients ON Providers.provider_id = Patients.provider_id
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT patient_name, dob FROM patients WHERE dob >= '1980-01-01';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, dob FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT plan_id, diagnosis, treatment_description FROM treatment_plans WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, dob FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='M';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty='Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_date, purpose FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, dob, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT patient_id, name, dob, gender FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;

SELECT p.name AS patient_name, h.name AS provider_name, pr.diagnosis FROM patients p INNER JOIN patient_records pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id INNER JOIN healthcare_providers h ON pr.provider_id = h.provider_id;
SELECT p.name AS patient_name, a.appointment_date, a.purpose FROM appointments a INNER JOIN patients p ON a.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE a.appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE provider_id = 3;
SELECT count(*) FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM Patients ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, phone_number FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM Patients ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, phone_number, specialty FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE provider_id > 3;
SELECT record_id, patient_id, record_date, diagnosis FROM Medical_Records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, reason FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
